[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1574281597568{margin-bottom: 3% !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Looking to Leverage Email Marketing Automation? Here’s How!

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1590517297729{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]There’s a reason email is the most commonly automated marketing channel. By leveraging email marketing automation, you can send consistent, customized content to your target audiences while:[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”We’ll break down:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1575476205223{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”xm-hide font-size-30px hide”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

  • Reducing hours spent manually scheduling and deploying emails
  • Nurturing potential clients who have engaged with your brand
  • Earning higher conversion rates from more qualified leads

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1590517724127{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]In this easy-to-read eBook, you’ll find all the basics to help you get started with email marketing automation. You’ll discover how to:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

  • Build an effective email marketing strategy
  • Identify and measure the right KPIs
  • Find the right automation platform for you

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes” el_class=”xm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1562845575080{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_separator color=”green” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523913504382{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]”Personalized content and marketing automation are two major pillars of lead generation, which is why we collaborated with SharpSpring to share valuable strategies for digital marketers.” – Claire Berge, Director of Marketing at Brandpoint[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”158563″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1592493794013{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”hidden”][vc_column]
